Articles.Content:
Recently the exterior camera's behavior was changed so it zooms in to avoid clipping inside buildings, etc. It looks more professional, but unfortunately this makes the camera temporarily unusable when flying through tunnels, into hangars, and near structures. It would be cool to have a checkbox option to revert to the previous behavior. Thanks!

Edited August 27, 2014 by Claw
I agree, this should be changed back, or maybe just allow the camera to clip through buildings/tunnels.. You can't even climb stairs at the KSC anymore
